extendedInfo.description: **GAME ALERT** Play Bejeweled Blitz. Treat yourself to an exciting take on the world's #1 puzzle game from PopCap! New players Get 100,000 Coins Free. http://smarturl.it/blitzFind F-U-N for FREE! Test your way with words on Android with the BOGGLE game, the all-time favorite word search! Tick-tock. Beat the clock! â¢ Search for words in 4 different BOGGLE modesâ¢ Challenge up to 4 friends via Facebook or Pass âN Play â¢ Test your word search skills in 48 unique Scenariosâ¢ Find words faster with intuitive touch controlsâ¢ Unlock 44 Wordy Achievementsâ¢ Customize your own set of BOGGLE rules with Panic Flip, Portal Cubes, Time, and Self Score Mode (for those pencil and paper fans) â¢ Define words instantly with Dictionary.comâ¢ Improve your play with exclusive power-ups like Hunch, Triple It, and Haltâ¢ Boost your score with Bonus WordsGet a full BOGGLE experience for FREE! Play the ultimate word search challenge NOW!Not a big fan of ads? Upgrade for a low price! Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: Was great, not anymore
reviews.comment: After updating, I more have ads. I paid to have them removed when I first downloaded game. What happened? I don\'t play it like I use to, so annoying. Please undo the ads for people who have paid. Thank you.
reviews.author: tonya moseley

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: It could run smoother. Words & word list aren\'t always right. I like Boggle so I play but wish it was better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads block things
reviews.comment: I could not get the game to begin because of the ads blocking it.  Sometimes it starts up but most of the time not.
reviews.author: Deborah Veater

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t boot
reviews.comment: Tried twice downloading and didn\'t work, screen remained black upon start after using data to download... Thanks ea! Works perfectly on my friends phone and mine is much newer than hers, can\'t fathom it
reviews.author: Stuart Hugh

reviews.title: screen goes black
reviews.comment: Like playing this game, but the screen goes black right in the middle of the game. I push the back button & resume the game then it goes black again!!!! So Annoying!!!
reviews.author: Kelly Powers

reviews.title: The type of words used needs to be modified
reviews.comment: This game is good but certain words should not be included such as names like Bes means Beth. And if the don\'t have a definition of a word then it should not be used. And no abbreviated words like EMS.
reviews.author: Arshale Morina

reviews.title: Love it......
reviews.comment: This gane is awesoemly epic  I luv this game so much, I couod play on it all day.....!
reviews.author: Aman Dhaliwal

reviews.title: Can\'t Get it to Run
reviews.comment: I have this on my phone and it\'s great. But it won\'t play on my Next book tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great for me. Features such as in game dictionary and alternative game modes make it even better than the original boggle.
reviews.author: victor medina

reviews.title: Super fun
reviews.comment: Better than I had hoped. This game has great graphics and different modes too play in allowing for multi player games.
reviews.author: Grace T

reviews.title: Dropping My Rating
reviews.comment: This game is a ton of fun. And I originally gave it 5 stars. But when legitimate words in the dictionary, that might not have the greatest definition, are not allowed in this, I\'m very disappointed. Don\'t preach values in a game app. I\'m playing this game to get away from those kinds of things. Lowered your score.
reviews.author: Cris Musni

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Can\'t play because adds blocking screen and my screen blacks out.
reviews.author: Syn Robinson

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: I have installed and uninstalled several times...  When I try to open the app the screen goes black and nothing happens... So disappointed..
reviews.author: Lauren Caley

reviews.title: I enjoy this app.
reviews.comment: The game is fun, but while I could see the advertisement in the corner, the rest of the screen went black. This happened often.
reviews.author: Meko Smith

reviews.title: Engaging
reviews.comment: Entertaining, and allows for a little mental fitness.  Ads are annoying, would consider paying to get rid of them.
reviews.author: Luann Clark

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Used to play the old version on paper and now I can do it digitally!  Good job!
reviews.author: Jenn Angelini

reviews.title: Fun!!
reviews.comment: If you love words,  this game will challenge you.
reviews.author: Kate Oliver Webb

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: This is my favorite game of this sort on apps, but the ads are horrendous and the app sucks all my battery up.
reviews.author: Dawn Kaczmar

reviews.title: Ads are too much!
reviews.comment: Even paid the .99 to stop them, but the app keeps resetting itself to show them :( We really do enjoy the app on iPod, just not a huge fan on Android yet; hence 3 stars!!!
reviews.author: Lewis Fowler

reviews.title: Like the gameplay, hate the sluggish performance
reviews.comment: The app takes forever to load on my HTC Inspire. I suspect it\'s the ads...slowing things down. My slow home network may be partly to blame.
reviews.author: Dennis Clements
